description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Prey Mutagen (Lesser)], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Prey Mutagen (Moderate)], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Prey Mutagen (Greater)], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Prey Mutagen (Major)] via Ephemeral Effect

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls.

publication.title: Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm
